Others: Steph Curry scored 17 points, dished out 10 assists, and pulled down 9 rebounds in the Warriors' season opener against the Trail Blazers, but had a poor shooting night with a 40% FG%.
Buddy Hield added 22 points off the bench for the Warriors, while Moses Moody, Trayce Jackson-Davis, and Jonathan Kuminga added 15, 14, and 10 points, respectively.
Scoot Henderson led Portland with 22 points.
Steph Curry expressed his focus on chasing another championship for the Warriors despite the offseason changes.
